full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DPAL RDO RJE SDER MO'I BZLOG BSGYUR BZHUGS SO,, ,, *, ,DPAL RDO RJE SDER MO'I MNAN PA BZHUGS SO,, ,,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004B (CES NAS RDO RJE SDER MO'I BZLOG BSGYUR LA PHAN YON NI LTAS NGAN BRGYAD BCU RTZA GCIG NANG RIMS BZHI BRGYA RTZA BZHI MI KHA DGRA KHA GOD KHA BYAD KHA PHUR KHA LTAS NGAN PA DANG, DGRA BGEGS NAD GDON BAR CHAD PHYUGS LA GOD KHA BGEGS LA MI PHYUGS NAD YAMS BON PO RGYA NAG 'BAB PA, KHA MCHU NAG PO MDO GANG MANG BYA, CES PA 'DI SNE BHA BHA GUNG BRA HOR PAndI TA BSKUL BA'I NGOR AER TI NI CHING PE SHE RIL THU 'JAM DPAL RDO RJE NO MO HANG MDZAD PA'O, ,BKRA SHIS LHUN GRUB NAM MKHA'I YIN, BKRA SHIS DPAL 'BYOR MA GRUB PA'I, BKRA SHIS GNAS 'DIR YONGS SU RDZOGS, BKRA SHIS BSTAN PA'I BKRA SHIS SHOG ,'JAM RDO RJE GDAN SU PA M'A YA RGYA:)
